DECLARE @TransactionName varchar(20) = 'TransactionDBA';  

BEGIN TRY
    BEGIN TRAN @TransactionName
		PRINT ('Try transaction')
		-- Test here

		-- Test parameters	

		-- Test here

	-- ROLLBACK TRAN @TransactionName
	COMMIT TRAN @TransactionName
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
	PRINT ('Catch block!')

	IF(@@TRANCOUNT > 0)
        ROLLBACK TRAN @TransactionName

	Declare @ITObjectName nvarchar(126) Set @ITObjectName = OBJECT_NAME (@@PROCID) Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName 
END CATCH
